briefdescription.para: Getter for instance.
Isolates a section of code for sequential processing by each process one at a time.
Broadcasts a string message to all processes from root/master process.

parameterdescription.para: Reference to string message to be broadcasted.

briefdescription.para: Checks if global process ID is non-negative and number of processes is greater than zero.

simplesect.para: True if conditions are met, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Sends a flag to the next process and waits for all processes to finish.
Finalizes MPI by calling MPI_Finalize if not already finalized.
Getter for global process id.

simplesect.para: The global process ID as an integer.

briefdescription.para: Getter for host name.
Getter for local process id.

simplesect.para: Local process ID as an integer.

briefdescription.para: Getter for N processes.

simplesect.para: The number of processes as an integer.

briefdescription.para: Getter for nsub group processes.
Getter for partner process id.

simplesect.para: ID of the partner process as an integer.

briefdescription.para: Getter for sub group.
Getter for sub group rank.

simplesect.para: The subgroup rank as an integer.

briefdescription.para: Waits for all processes in MPI_COMM_WORLD to reach this barrier.
Initializes MPI environment and sets up process groups/communicators.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to integer for command line argument count
Double pointer to character array for command line arguments
Boolean flag indicating whether to split processes

briefdescription.para: Checks if the current process is a member of the even subgroup.

simplesect.para: True if it's an even group member, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Checks if even/odd split is valid.

simplesect.para: True if split is valid, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Collects and prints messages from all processes in a MPI parallel environment. when called, this function must be encountered by all processes or the program will lock up, treat it as a global barrier use it to safely print messages from each process without clobbering the ouput.

parameterdescription.para: Message to be printed by all processes.

briefdescription.para: Checks if processes are split into two groups based on even/odd ranks.

simplesect.para: True if in split mode, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: interface functions for initialization of a MPI environment
